title: Akron Beacon Journal - Wikipedia
snippet: The Akron Beacon Journal is a morning newspaper in Akron, Ohio, United States. Owned by Gannett, it is the sole daily newspaper in Akron and is distributed throughout Northeast Ohio. The paper's coverage focuses on local news.

title: Beacon Journal owner GateHouse Media acquires Gannett
snippet: GateHouse Media, the company that owns the Akron Beacon Journal and nine other Ohio newspapers, on Monday announced its long-planned acquisition of Gannett, creating the nation’s largest newspaper chain.

title: Akron Beacon Journal newspaper in Akron Ohio - MondoTimes.com
snippet: The Akron Beacon Journal is one of the highest circulation newspapers in the USA. This newspaper is owned by Gannett Company, Inc.

title: Akron Beacon Journal 2025 Company Profile: Valuation, Investors, Acquisition | PitchBook
snippet: Akron Beacon Journal was acquired by Gannett Company.

title: Can it be saved? Frustrated owner doesn’t want to raze old Beacon Journal building
snippet: The Beacon Journal won four Pulitzers from its base at 44 E. Exchange St. GateHouse Media, now known as Gannett, purchased the Beacon Journal from Canadian company Black Press Ltd.
